page.title: 05REPORT ON DOMESDAY TRIP
page.content: {REPORT ON DOMESDAY TRIP { As we went into our area for study we saw many new houses by Lake which need putting on our map.Just before Lake is an electricity shed near "Pill Farm" just beside the signpost for Lake.As we passed through the village we could see the tower on top of the hill directly ahead of us.It is now used for clay pigeon shooting.Lake is mostly made up of roughly twelve cottages along the road and a few modern houses.As we came down the hill we saw a sign saying 6'6",mile which is a warning of the bridge just before the turning for Tawstock School. After the bridge we saw the keepers cottage worthy of a mention in future references.
